description: Lumbee Guaranty Bank provides various community banking services. The company offers personal and business checking and savings accounts; personal certificates of deposit and individual retirement accounts; and business investment accounts. It also provides mortgage, auto, personal, and business loans, as well as lines of credit; personal convenience and business services. In addition, the company offers online, bill pay, mobile, and telephone banking services. It operates fourteen branch offices in Robeson, Cumberland, and Hoke counties in North Carolina. The company was formerly known as Lumbee Bank and changed its name to Lumbee Guaranty Bank in 1991. Lumbee Guaranty Bank was incorporated in 1971 and is based in Pembroke, North Carolina.
